about_the_game:
Ipseity: Arena is a modern-day take on classic fast paced multiplayer Arena Shooter genre in which players get to choose Ipseities, movement types such as bunny hopping, sliding, or walljumping that the player chooses to play as before entering the fragging grounds!

Ipseity: Arena modernizes the weapon mechanics of the AFPS genre by utilizing instant weapon combos that Challenge Promode Arena revolutionized, utilize the power of each weapon to frag even harder, comboing from automatic weapons such as the SMG and Lightning Cannon to hard-hitting weapons such as the Rocket Launcher and Railbolt to frag even harder!

Ipseity: Arena is the celebration of the Arena FPS genre, taking the beauty of the variety of movement and the intricacy of the arsenals to allow the player to find their own footing and frag out.

name: Ipseity: Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Ipseity: Arena is a modern-day take on classic fast paced multiplayer Arena Shooter genre in which players get to choose Ipseities, movement types such as bunny hopping, sliding, or walljumping that players can choose to play as before entering the fragging grounds!
